questions.scenario: Company wants to implement AI resume screening in NYC, California, and Illinois offices
questions.question: What are the compliance requirements for using AI in hiring across NYC, California, and Illinois?
questions.search_query: AI hiring screening compliance requirements NYC Local Law 144 California Illinois

questions.scenario: Employee fired for social media post criticizing company's DEI policies outside work hours
questions.question: What are the potential wrongful termination claims for an employee fired for criticizing company DEI policies on personal social media?
questions.search_query: employee fired social media DEI criticism wrongful termination NLRA First Amendment at-will

questions.scenario: Startup wants to issue equity compensation to contractors in multiple states
questions.question: What securities law compliance is required for issuing equity compensation to independent contractors across multiple states?
questions.search_query: equity compensation independent contractors securities law Rule 701 state blue sky

questions.scenario: Client received EEOC right-to-sue letter dated October 15, 2024
questions.question: If someone received an EEOC right-to-sue letter on October 15, 2024, what is the deadline to file a federal lawsuit and what are the exceptions?
questions.search_query: EEOC right to sue letter 90 day deadline federal court equitable tolling

questions.scenario: Company data breach exposed customer SSNs and medical information
questions.question: What are the notification requirements for a data breach involving both SSNs and medical information in California, and what are the penalties for non-compliance?
questions.search_query: data breach notification California SSN medical information CCPA CMIA HIPAA penalties

questions.scenario: Non-profit organization wants to lobby for climate legislation
questions.question: What are the federal lobbying registration and reporting requirements for a 501(c)(3) organization engaging in climate policy advocacy?
questions.search_query: 501c3 nonprofit lobbying registration LDA federal reporting requirements advocacy

questions.scenario: Tech company planning IPO with dual-class share structure
questions.question: What are the SEC disclosure requirements and stock exchange rules for companies going public with dual-class voting structures?
questions.search_query: dual class share structure IPO SEC disclosure NYSE NASDAQ listing requirements

questions.scenario: Healthcare provider implementing telemedicine across state lines
questions.question: What are the licensing and malpractice insurance requirements for physicians providing telemedicine services across state borders?
questions.search_query: telemedicine licensing requirements interstate medical practice malpractice insurance

questions.scenario: Contractor classification audit by Department of Labor
questions.question: What is the current federal standard for independent contractor classification and what are the penalties for misclassification?
questions.search_query: independent contractor classification DOL federal standard penalties misclassification

questions.question: What are the foreign investment notification requirements under CFIUS for a Chinese technology company acquiring a US AI startup?
questions.search_query: CFIUS foreign investment notification Chinese technology AI startup acquisition requirements

rag_evaluation.support_ratio: fraction of answer sentences supported by retrieved docs (cosine similarity >= 0.6)
rag_evaluation.authority_of_cited: mean authority score of documents actually cited in answer
rag_evaluation.llm_judge: pairwise comparison for completeness and accuracy using GPT-4
rag_evaluation.freshness_check: for freshness_sensitive queries, check if answer reflects recent law

task_categories.multi_jurisdiction_compliance: Questions requiring analysis across multiple jurisdictions
task_categories.employment_law_analysis: Workplace law questions with constitutional/statutory intersections
task_categories.privacy_compliance: Data protection and privacy law requirements
task_categories.securities_disclosure: Public company disclosure and governance rules
